page.title: 20Games we play
page.content: In the playground we play many games. Sometimes we play skipping games like "Colours".In this two people shake the rope on the ground, before they start they both choose a colour and they must not tell anyone else. Someone then jumps over the rope and shouts what they think the colour is. Another rope game is "Witches and Fairies" and another "Jump in when it's your birthday". In this you jump through the rope when your birthday month is called. The ring games we play include "Cat's got the Measles" and "Farmers in his Den". We also play Tag games where one person has to be "It",and tries to catch the other people. {The work for this project has come {from the children of Roding Primary {School.The ages of the children who {have made contributions ranges from 6 {to 11 years. }
